practice_phrases.target: I was tired after I finished learning
I am tired because I was trying to speak

practice_phrases.known: 我昨天累了但是我现在准备好了
practice_phrases.target: I was tired yesterday but I am ready now

practice_phrases.known: 我想说但是我太累了无法解释
practice_phrases.target: I wanted to speak but I was too tired to explain

practice_phrases.known: 我累了因为我整天都在学习如何说
practice_phrases.target: I am tired because I was learning how to speak all day

practice_phrases.known: 我今天早上想和你说话但是我太累了记不住
practice_phrases.target: I wanted to speak with you this morning but I was too tired to remember
